Overview

This page meant to bring inspiration for desigining a robotic arm as final project for the FabZero course.

Existing robotic arm projects

It is possible to find several projects of robotic arm on the internet. Here I will list some I have found.

  • MeArm: Open source robot arm designed using small number of components.

  • How to Mechatronics: This youtube channel offers two very nice ideas of robotic arm build using the concepts learned in the classes.
    • Static arm): the arm is fixed in the ground and have 4 points of movements. It uses arduino to decide about the movements of the arm and smartphone app to request the arm to move.
    • Mobile arm: It is the same “Static arm” but now integrated in a mobile vehicle. The mobile app has been changed because there was a problem of integrating some components with the arduino.

*
